column3: It would be more helpful if you combine your documentation changes into one commit, and don't submit a new pull request every time.\nEasier to review, won't cause a discussion for every little change, and doesn't clog up our issue list.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/p4653_b6884b8594813ab0cf539022a73e9ab45badee33/ for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-te
